channel.title: Microsoft on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft on Arrans github.io

item.title: massgravel/Microsoft-Activation-Scripts
item.description: Open-source Windows and Office activator featuring HWID, Ohook, TSforge, KMS38, and Online KMS activation methods, along with advanced troubleshooting.

item.title: microsoft/FluidFramework
item.description: Library for building distributed, real-time collaborative web applications

item.title: dotnet/maui
item.description: .NET MAUI is the .NET Multi-platform App UI, a framework for building native device applications spanning mobile, tablet, and desktop.

item.title: ether/etherpad-lite
item.description: Etherpad: A modern really-real-time collaborative document editor.

item.title: Tropix126/fluent-svelte
item.description: A faithful implementation of Microsoft’s Fluent Design System in Svelte.
